revised_title: Differences in Physiological Effects of Poisons from Indian Venomous Snakes
tldr: This article examines the physiological effects of poisons from different species of Indian venomous snakes, focusing on the cobra. It details the symptoms and effects of cobra poisoning on mammals, birds, and amphibia, as well as humans. The author discusses the local and systemic effects of the poison, its impact on the nervous system, and potential treatments for snakebite victims.
